ITEM_TYPES.name: saiyanArmor
ITEM_TYPES.description: Saiyan Armor is a body equipment the increases defense.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to defense.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: Armor worn by Saiyan Warriors, featuring broad shoulder pads and pointed fauld.

ITEM_TYPES.name: scouter
ITEM_TYPES.description: Scouter is a head equipment the increases accuracy and lowers spirit.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to accuracy and a -1 to spirit.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: A device worn on the ear by Saiyan Warriors. A piece of colored glass covers an eye and a metal housing covers the ear. Used to identify power levels but is notoriously faulty.

ITEM_TYPES.name: senzuBean
ITEM_TYPES.description: Senzu Bean is a consumable item that restores health and archetype counters.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: Hp becomes set to full, archetype counters become set to max.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: A mystical bean cultivated by Korin atop Korin, especially rare and helpful during battles for the fate of the earth.

ITEM_TYPES.name: turleHermitGi
ITEM_TYPES.description: Turtle Hermit Gi is a body equipment the increases agility.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to agility.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: An orange gi worn by the students of the Turtle School, trained by Master Roshi.

ITEM_TYPES.name: powerPole
ITEM_TYPES.description: Power Pole is a weapon equipment that grants its wielder the PowerPoleMove move.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: When equipped, the character can use the -PowerPoleMove- move.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: A simple red pole contained by a red sheathe worn on the back, when called upon the Power Pole can extend to extreme heights.

ITEM_TYPES.name: demonClanClothes
ITEM_TYPES.description: Demon Clan CLothes is a body equipment the increases defense and lowers agility.
ITEM_TYPES.descriptionParams: When equipped, the character gets a +2 to defense and a -1 to agility.
ITEM_TYPES.extraDescription: The outfit worn by the demon clan. A purple gi, pointed brown shoes and a weighted cape with broad shoulder pads. The increased weight is said to aid in training.
